title: 1/2 ban from ranked????????????????????????????
body:
I picked leblanc mid and literally did not press the 'LOCK IN' fucking button so i get a ban for half a fucking hour? are you fucking kidding me?

This kind of bullshit and the chat bans = not ever buying a fucking skin. This is beyond a fucking joke.

replies.body: Just try taking my advice, and press that lock in button. Simple as pie.
oh look i got a fucking 5 minute ban for not banning a champion, what teh fuck?
Just press the lock in button. It might help you out.
Pretty sure you're wasting everyones time by not locking in as soon as you pick your champion

I'm glad you came on here to add a ban from the Boards to your list.

GG friend
Like it ain't that hard to press the lock in button. You should try it.
